Reviews.Title: “A little gem of a hostel”
Reviews.Author: catzenjammer
Reviews.Content: recently spent 6 days rome budget low decided try hostel weve hostels europe pretty horrible apprehensive decided clean feel sleeping wed stay hotel colors simple comfortable clean value €75 paid night pleasant surprises reached hotel begin discovered lowbudget buss airport stops piazza cavour blocks hostel guide rome told otherwise discovered breakfast included wasnt decent coffee tea fruits selection juices selection cakes bread cornflakes etc served morning 8 10am idea able online free internet access connect ones pc network computer breakfast finally astonishment discovered brandnew redecorated bathroom constructed nice balcony needless newly refurbished spotless arrived addition cleaned day terms location hotel colors city center lies castel san angelo vatican quiet street distances rome arent 15mins walk piazza navona 10mins vatican plenty public transport nearby piazza cavour via cicerone vatican metro stops 10mins via cola di rienzo plenty shops ristorante trattoria evening meals nearby staff nice polite spoke english clean quiet sleep wander romes monuments dont expect luxuries hotel colors perfect choice note require lift hostel stairs didnt bother
